intro: Koelreuteria incompleta, commonly known as the Chinese lantern tree, is a deciduous tree native to China. It is characterized by its showy, orange-red蒴果 (capsular fruits) that resemble small lanterns, which are a striking feature in the autumn. The plant has simple, alternate leaves that are ovate to elliptic in shape. It thrives in well-drained soils and full sun, making it a popular ornamental tree in gardens. The species is also valued for its ability to tolerate urban conditions and its role in supporting local wildlife.
